|vendor_id = 14e4 |device_id = 4318 |subvendor_id = 1737 |subdevice_id = 0049 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = Q87-WPC54GSV2 |icid = 3839A-WPCGSV2 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:16:B6, 00:1A:70
|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4318E;BCM4318EKFBG, HA0442 P20, 710960 N; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/14/2005 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The device is a ''[[CyberTAN]]'' WE607-BF.
WPC54GS v2.0 serial numbers appear to start with '''BGO2'''.
